eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.block.db
Class JDBCConverter

java.lang.Object
  eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.block.db.JDBCConverter

public final class JDBCConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to convert to and from SQL and XML representation of values in JDBC queries.

Author:
karnokd, 2012.02.28.

Converts the current row of the resultset into the appropriate ADVANCE XML type.

Parameters:
resolver - the data resolver used for the conversion
rs - the resultset
rsmd - the resultset metadata
Returns:
the XML map of the key-value pairs from the row
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - on error

convert

public static int convert(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.DataResolver<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement> resolver,
                          eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement value,
                          java.sql.PreparedStatement pstm,
                          int counter)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Sets the given primitive XML value (string, int, real, timestamp, boolean) on the current prepared statement field.

Parameters:
resolver - the data resolver to extract the actual primitive type
value - the value to use
pstm - the target statement
counter - the current index
Returns:
the next index
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - on error
